amendatorysection.catchline: Teleracing facilities and telephonic wagering; commission; jurisdiction; rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: The State Racing Commission shall have general jurisdiction over the approval of and shall issue licenses to licensed racetracks for the operation of teleracing facilities and telephonic wagering. The commission shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out sections 2-1230 to 2-1242.
